title: BEAUTIFUL BRIGHT STUDIO EAST VILLAGE
posting_body: ['Hi there,', 'I have a beautiful bright spacious fully lux renovated studio in the East Village on a second-floor walkup available Sept. 1st $2600', 'Located on 1st street the studio features a separate kitchen and large bathroom.', 'Two large windows give amazing light.', 'Near all Zagat rated best restaurants, pubs, beer gardens and roof tops.', ' Inly steps away from the F train and close to JMZ lines that take you to Brooklyn.', 'Walking distance to the Lower East Side just across Houston, also to Chinatown, two bridges, little Italy, West Village, Soho, Noho, buses to Gramercy, Kips Bay, Murray hill and upper east side.', 'Unfurnished', 'Credit required', 'USA guarantors accepted', '12 months min.', 'lease', 'Call or text asap!', 'Allie', '718-614-7104']
